title: When are we getting the increased bans
body:
So this was mentioned by riot a while ago, and i wanted to ask, when can we expect the increased amount of bans for ranked?

At this point i'm almost willing to wait until that increase for when i start going into ranked again, but if it's going to take most of the season then i won't bother waiting.

replies.body: probably after the pre-season. But I personally think it would be a dumb idea to increase bans. I think that's bans should be used to take out the strongest champions and if there's more then 6, then someone isn't doing their job properly or the patch was really good for a group of champions.

more champs will be released
more bans required

Perhaps they should slow down the production line on new champions, there's enough in the game at the moment. I think more bans will mean certain champions at certain elos will not ever make it onto the rift (e.g. Yasuo).
i'm actually fine with no yasuo on the rift
Same, but your champion could be next! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Don't think Diana would be affected much by the 10 ppl ban :p

But if more champions are released, then there are more champions for people to play, and less reason to permaban certain champions, because less people will be playing Yasuo, and more people will be playing newer champions.
